description: Utility for setting up and maintaining an instance of Open QuarterMaster.

dependencies.deb: bash, curl, jq, libnss-mdns, hwinfo, moreutils, dialog, docker.io, unattended-upgrades, ca-certificates, python3 (>= 3.10.0), python3-cryptography, python3-dialog, python3-docker, python3-systemd, python3-argcomplete, python3-jinja2, python3-distutils-extra
dependencies.rpm: bash, curl, jq, hwinfo, moreutils, dialog, docker, python3
